title: The Double Emphasis Thing
abstract: I used to have this boss who loved, loved, loved to emphasize words. This was way back before we used a WYSIWYG editors and I’d have to handcode that crap.

title: Different Ways to Get CSS Gradient Shadows
abstract: It's a question I hear asked quite often: Is it possible to create shadows from gradients instead of sol'id' colors? There is no specific CSS property that does this (believe me, I've looked) and any blog post you find about …
